TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 在 Managed 至 COM Interop 案例中，提供使用者自訂 Interop Stub 的支援。

span.span: Provides support for user customization of interop stubs in managed-to-COM interop scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓具有認知封送處理和 interop 呼叫來執行下列的內部運作的 interop 開發人員：This attribute enables interop developers who have knowledge about marshaling and the inner workings of interop calls to do the following: - 在建置階段，而不是執行階段利用自訂 interop 虛設常式。Take advantage of customized interop stubs at build time instead of run time. - 偵錯自訂 interop 虛設常式。Debug customized interop stubs. - 提供在執行階段不會提供 stub 封送處理功能。Provide marshaling capabilities within a stub that the runtime does not provide. - 提供使用者特定方法分派功能。Provide user-specific method dispatch capabilities. 您可以套用的屬性上指定的受管理的原生 COM interop 對應虛設常式方法的介面中的方法。You apply the attribute on a method in an interface to specify a corresponding stub method for managed-to-native COM interop. 如果在執行階段期間遇到這個屬性時，common language runtime 不會以動態方式產生 interop 的虛設常式。If this attribute is encountered during run time, the common language runtime does not dynamically generate an interop stub. 相反地，它會叫用自訂在建置期間建立的虛設常式。Instead, it invokes the custom stub that was created at build time. 屬性具有下列特性：The attribute has the following characteristics: - 屬性只能用於從標記的介面方法`[ComImport]`。The attribute can be used only on methods from interfaces that are marked `[ComImport]`. 如果此屬性會套用至非介面類型，則會忽略由執行階段。If the attribute is applied to non-interface types, it is ignored by the runtime. - 屬性可以用於一次在介面中相同的方法。The attribute can be used only once on the same method in an interface. 如果使用超過一次，編譯器會產生重複的屬性時發生錯誤。If it is used more than once, the compiler generates a duplicated attribute error. - 屬性不是繼承自基底介面中。The attribute is not inheritable from a base interface. 衍生的介面必須明確地指派屬性。Derived interfaces must explicitly assign the attribute. - 包含的屬性化的方法的組件也必須包含自訂的虛設常式。The assembly that contains the attributed method must also contain the customized stub. 多載的虛設常式方法都是有效的。Overloaded stub methods are valid. 雖然您指定的型別和虛設常式方法的名稱，執行階段會探索對應的虛設常式。Although you specify only the type and the name of the stub method, the runtime will discover the corresponding stub. 它會檢查在介面方法中，所有引數，然後執行 比對的方式使用明確的完整簽章`this`指標。It does this by examining all the arguments on the interface method, and then performing full signature matching by using an explicit `this` pointer. 也可能會共用相同的虛設常式方法; 介面中的多個方法不過，您應該注意當您使用共用的虛設常式。It is also possible for multiple methods in an interface to share the same stub method; however, you should be careful when you use shared stubs. > [!NOTE] > 虛設常式方法必須為靜態。Stub methods must be static. 您可以通知執行階段使用自訂 interop 虛設常式在建置階段，而不是執行階段使用下列 C# 程式碼：You could inform the runtime to use a customized interop stub at build time instead of run time with the following C# code: ``` [ComImport] interface IMyInterface { [ManagedToNativeComInteropStubAttribute(typeof(TestStubClass), "ForwardTestStub")] void GetString (string arg); } ``` 您接著可以使用下列程式碼，來宣告對應的虛設常式方法：You could then use the following code to declare the corresponding stub method: ``` class TestStubClass { internal static void ForwardTestStub(IMyInterface thisObject, string arg) {…} } ```

param.name: classType
param.span: 包含所需 Stub 方法的類別。

span.span: The class that contains the required stub method.
The name of the stub method.

summary.span: 使用指定的類別型別和方法名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified class type and method name.

exception.span: 方法不是靜態或非泛用的。

span.span: The method is not static or non-generic.

exception.span: 方法的參數清單不符合 Stub 的預期參數清單。

span.span: The method's parameter list does not match the expected parameter list for the stub.

exception.span: 因為 Stub 方法具有私用或保護的存取範圍，或因為安全性問題，包含受 Managed Interop 方法的介面無法存取 Stub 方法。

span.span: The interface that contains the managed interop method has no access to the stub method, because the stub method has private or protected accessibility, or because of a security issue.
